body: So today I am sitting mining a monument minding my own business when I get kicked for "Attempt of team spleef" no one close to me and no warning. Then I come back on the same server , and John says Yo WB ;) so I asked him if he was blind and he said that I don't belong on the server if I team grief. Then some one said "John what was me you were looking at" before I could  get a screenshoot I was temp - banned

title: So Mod John may be blind.....
